segments.text: Last month , we only had 40 hits on our site . Our products and prices are good , but the problem is that no one knows about our website .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If we want to get this internet business off the ground , we've got to do something fast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need to maximize the chances that our site will be at the top of search engine lists , but I'm not sure how to do it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We've got to put more buzz words into the page text , so it will pop up when people search about our kind of products .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you're right . We've got to get the most popular phrases there ... How else can we boost site traffic ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think one of the least costly ways to attract business is to ask some of our neighboring sites to offer links to our page inside of theirs . If they have related services , they may be willing to help us out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess we could also put out a few advertisements for our website inside of the search engine . I would like to find the most effective way to let people know about our site and our products .
segments.speaker: S1
